actions.name: OnOpenPR
actions.description: An event triggered when a pull request is opened on the repository given as parameter

params.name: owner
params.description: The user's username that owns the repository

params.name: repo
params.description: The targeted repository's name

returns.name: PR_NAME
returns.description: The opened pull request name

returns.name: PR_BODY
returns.description: The opened pull request body

returns.name: PR_OPENER
returns.description: The user's username that opened the pull request

returns.name: PR_HEAD
returns.description: The name of the branch to merge into the base branch

returns.name: PR_BASE
returns.description: The name of the branch to merge head branch into

returns.name: REPO_NAME
returns.description: The name of the repository

returns.name: REPO_OWNER
returns.description: The user's username that owns the repository

actions.name: OnCommentPR
actions.description: An event triggered by a new comment inside the pull request on the repository given as parameter

params.name: owner
params.description: The user's username that owns the repository

params.name: repo
params.description: The targeted repository's name

returns.name: PR_NAME
returns.description: The opened pull request name

returns.name: PR_BODY
returns.description: The opened pull request body

returns.name: PR_OPENER
returns.description: The user's username that opened the pull request

returns.name: PR_HEAD
returns.description: The name of the branch to merge into the base branch

returns.name: PR_BASE
returns.description: The name of the branch to merge head branch into

returns.name: REPO_NAME
returns.description: The name of the repository

returns.name: REPO_OWNER
returns.description: The user's username that owns the repository

returns.name: COMMENTER
returns.description: The user's username that comment the pull request

returns.name: COMMENT_BODY
returns.description: The body of the new comment on the pull request

actions.name: OnClosePR
actions.description: An event triggered when a pull request is closed on the repository given as parameter

params.name: owner
params.description: The user's username that owns the repository

params.name: repo
params.description: The targeted repository's name

returns.name: PR_NAME
returns.description: The opened pull request name

returns.name: PR_BODY
returns.description: The opened pull request body

returns.name: PR_OPENER
returns.description: The user's username that opened the pull request

returns.name: PR_HEAD
returns.description: The name of the branch to merge into the base branch

returns.name: PR_BASE
returns.description: The name of the branch to merge head branch into

returns.name: REPO_NAME
returns.description: The name of the repository

returns.name: REPO_OWNER
returns.description: The user's username that owns the repository

actions.name: OnMergePR
actions.description: An event triggered when a pull request is merged on the repository given as parameter

params.name: owner
params.description: The user's username that owns the repository

params.name: repo
params.description: The targeted repository's name

returns.name: PR_NAME
returns.description: The opened pull request name

returns.name: PR_BODY
returns.description: The opened pull request body

returns.name: PR_OPENER
returns.description: The user's username that opened the pull request

returns.name: PR_HEAD
returns.description: The name of the branch merged into the base branch

returns.name: PR_BASE
returns.description: The name of the branch to merge head branch into

returns.name: REPO_NAME
returns.description: The name of the repository

returns.name: REPO_OWNER
returns.description: The user's username that owns the repository

actions.name: OnCreateIssue
actions.description: An event triggered when an issue is created on the repository given as parameter

params.name: owner
params.description: The user's username that owns the repository

params.name: repo
params.description: The targeted repository's name

returns.name: REPO_NAME
returns.description: The name of the repository

returns.name: REPO_OWNER
returns.description: The user's username that owns the repository

returns.name: ISSUE_NAME
returns.description: The title of the created issue

returns.name: ISSUE_CONTENT
returns.description: The description of the created issue

returns.name: ISSUE_AUTHOR
returns.description: The issue creator username

actions.name: OnCommentIssue
actions.description: An event triggered when an user comments an issue on the repository given as parameter

params.name: owner
params.description: The user's username that owns the repository

params.name: repo
params.description: The targeted repository's name

returns.name: REPO_NAME
returns.description: The name of the repository

returns.name: REPO_OWNER
returns.description: The user's username that owns the repository

returns.name: ISSUE_NAME
returns.description: The title of the created issue

returns.name: ISSUE_CONTENT
returns.description: The description of the created issue

returns.name: ISSUE_AUTHOR
returns.description: The issue creator username

returns.name: COMMENT
returns.description: The body of the new comment on an issue of the repository given as parameter

returns.name: COMMENTER
returns.description: The author of the comment on an issue

actions.name: OnCloseIssue
actions.description: An event triggered when an issue is closed in the repository given as parameter

params.name: owner
params.description: The user's username that owns the repository

params.name: repo
params.description: The targeted repository's name

returns.name: REPO_NAME
returns.description: The name of the repository

returns.name: REPO_OWNER
returns.description: The user's username that owns the repository

returns.name: ISSUE_NAME
returns.description: The title of the created issue

returns.name: ISSUE_CONTENT
returns.description: The description of the created issue

returns.name: ISSUE_AUTHOR
returns.description: The issue creator username

actions.name: OnForkRepo
actions.description: An event triggered when the repository given as parameter is forked

params.name: owner
params.description: The user's username that owns the repository

params.name: repo
params.description: The targeted repository's name

returns.name: REPO_NAME
returns.description: The name of the repository

returns.name: REPO_OWNER
returns.description: The user's username that owns the repository

returns.name: FORKER
returns.description: The username of the user that fork the repository

actions.name: OnStarRepo
actions.description: An event triggered when a user star the repository given as parameter

params.name: owner
params.description: The user's username that owns the repository

params.name: repo
params.description: The targeted repository's name

returns.name: REPO_NAME
returns.description: The name of the repository

returns.name: REPO_OWNER
returns.description: The user's username that owns the repository

returns.name: STAR_COUNT
returns.description: The number of stars on the repository

returns.name: STARER
returns.description: The username of the user that starred the repository

actions.name: OnWatchRepo
actions.description: An event triggered when an user watch a repository

params.name: owner
params.description: The user's username that owns the repository

params.name: repo
params.description: The targeted repository's name

returns.name: REPO_NAME
returns.description: The name of the repository watched by the user

returns.name: REPO_OWNER
returns.description: The username of the user that owns the repository

returns.name: WATCH_COUNT
returns.description: The number of users watching the repository

returns.name: WATCHER
returns.description: The username of the user that watched the repository

reactions.name: OpenPR
reactions.description: Open a pull request on a given repository

params.name: owner
params.description: The username of the user that owns the repository

params.name: repo
params.description: The name of the repository

params.name: title
params.description: The title of the opened pull request

params.name: head
params.description: The name of the branch to merge into base branch

params.name: base
params.description: The name of the branch to merge intro head branch

returns.name: URL
returns.description: The url of the newly opened pull request

reactions.name: CommentPR
reactions.description: Comments the numbered pull request of the given repository

params.name: owner
params.description: The username of the repository owner

params.name: repo
params.description: The name of the repository

params.name: pull_number
params.description: The number assigned to the commented pull request

params.name: body
params.description: The body of the comment written under the pull request

returns.name: URL
returns.description: The url to the comment

reactions.name: ClosePR
reactions.description: Closes the pull request given as parameter

params.name: owner
params.description: The username of the user that owns the repository

params.name: repo
params.description: The name of the repository

params.name: pull_number
params.description: The number assigned to the pull request to close

reactions.name: MergePR
reactions.description: Merges the pull request given as parameter into base branch

params.name: owner
params.description: The username of the user that owns the repository

params.name: repo
params.description: The name of the repository

params.name: pull_number
params.description: The number assigned to the pull request to merge

reactions.name: CreateIssue
reactions.description: Creates an issue into the given repository

params.name: owner
params.description: The username of the repository owner

params.name: repo
params.description: The name of the repository

params.name: title
params.description: The title of the issue to create

params.name: body
params.description: The body of the issue to create

returns.name: URL
returns.description: The url of the newly created issue

reactions.name: CommentIssue
reactions.description: Comments the given issue into the given repository

params.name: owner
params.description: The username of the repository owner

params.name: repo
params.description: The name of the repository

params.name: issue_number
params.description: The number assigned to the issue to comment

params.name: body
params.description: The body of the comment

returns.name: URL
returns.description: The url of the newly created comment

reactions.name: CloseIssue
reactions.description: Closes the given issue into the given repository

params.name: owner
params.description: The username of the repository owner

params.name: repo
params.description: The name of the repository

params.name: issue_number
params.description: The number assigned to the issue to close

returns.name: URL
returns.description: The url of the closed issue

reactions.name: CreateRepo
reactions.description: Creates a new repository with the given name

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the repository to create

returns.name: URL
returns.description: The url of the newly created repository

reactions.name: CreatePrivateRepo
reactions.description: Creates a new private repository with the given name

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the private repository to create

returns.name: URL
returns.description: The url of the newly created private repository

reactions.name: UpdateDescription
reactions.description: Updates the description of the given repository

params.name: owner
params.description: The username of the repository owner

params.name: repo
params.description: The name of the repository

params.name: description
params.description: The description to set to the given repository

returns.name: URL
returns.description: The url of the repository

reactions.name: ForkRepo
reactions.description: Forks the repository of the user given as parameter

params.name: owner
params.description: The username of the repository owner

params.name: repo
params.description: The name of the repository

returns.name: URL
returns.description: The url of the forked repository

reactions.name: StarRepo
reactions.description: Stars the repository of the user given as parameter

params.name: owner
params.description: The username of the repository owner

params.name: repo
params.description: The name of the repository

reactions.name: WatchRepo
reactions.description: Watches the repository of the user given as parameter

params.name: owner
params.description: The username of the repository owner

params.name: repo
params.description: The name of the repository

actions.name: OnDiscordMessage
actions.description: An event triggered by the reception of a direct message

returns.name: MESSAGE
returns.description: The body of the received message

returns.name: AUTHOR_ID
returns.description: The Discord ID of the message's author

returns.name: AUTHOR_NAME
returns.description: The Discord username of the message's author

actions.name: OnDiscordMessageFrom
actions.description: An event triggered by the reception of a direct message from a specified user

params.name: user_id
params.description: The Discord ID of the sender

returns.name: MESSAGE
returns.description: The body of the received message

returns.name: AUTHOR_ID
returns.description: The Discord ID of the message's author

returns.name: AUTHOR_NAME
returns.description: The Discord username of the message's author

actions.name: OnDiscordMention
actions.description: An event triggered when the authenticated user is mentioned

returns.name: MESSAGE
returns.description: The body of the received message

returns.name: AUTHOR_ID
returns.description: The Discord ID of the message's author

returns.name: AUTHOR_NAME
returns.description: The Discord username of the message's author

actions.name: OnNewDiscordGuildMember
actions.description: An event triggered when a new member joins a guild

returns.name: NEW_MEMBER_ID
returns.description: The Discord ID of the new member

returns.name: NEW_MEMBER_NAME
returns.description: The Discord Username of the new member

returns.name: SERVER_ID
returns.description: The Discord ID of the guild

returns.name: SERVER_NAME
returns.description: The name of the guild

actions.name: OnDiscordGuildLeave
actions.description: An event triggered when a member leaves a guild

returns.name: NEW_MEMBER_ID
returns.description: The Discord ID of the new member

returns.name: NEW_MEMBER_NAME
returns.description: The Discord Username of the new member

returns.name: SERVER_ID
returns.description: The Discord ID of the guild

returns.name: SERVER_NAME
returns.description: The name of the guild

reactions.name: PostDiscordMessage
reactions.description: Posts a message on a given server (in a given channel)

params.name: server_id
params.description: The Discord ID of the server

params.name: channel_id
params.description: The Discord ID of the channel

params.name: content
params.description: The body of the message to post

returns.name: USER_ID
returns.description: The Discord ID of the sender

returns.name: USERNAME
returns.description: The Discord username of the sender

returns.name: MESSAGE_CONTENT
returns.description: The body of the posted message

returns.name: CHANNEL_ID
returns.description: The Discord ID of the channel

returns.name: CHANNEL_NAME
returns.description: The Discord name of the channel

returns.name: SERVER_ID
returns.description: The Discord ID of the server

returns.name: SERVER_NAME
returns.description: The Discord name of the server

reactions.name: PostDiscordDM
reactions.description: Sends a message to a given user

params.name: other_id
params.description: The Discord ID of the recipient

params.name: content
params.description: The body of the message to send

returns.name: USER_ID
returns.description: The Discord ID of the sender

returns.name: USERNAME
returns.description: The Discord username of the sender

returns.name: MESSAGE_CONTENT
returns.description: The body of the posted message

returns.name: SENDEE_ID
returns.description: The Discord ID of the recipient

returns.name: SENDEE_USERNAME
returns.description: The Discord name of the recipient

params.name: server_id
params.description: The Discord ID of the server

returns.name: USER_ID
returns.description: The Discord ID of the leaver

returns.name: USERNAME
returns.description: The Discord username of the leaver

returns.name: SERVER_ID
returns.description: The Discord ID of the server

returns.name: SERVER_NAME
returns.description: The Discord name of the server

params.name: status
params.description: The status to set

returns.name: USER_ID
returns.description: The Discord ID of the user

returns.name: USERNAME
returns.description: The Discord username of the user

returns.name: STATUS
returns.description: The Discord status of the user
